title: About Hari
text:
Hello! I am Hari,
I am a third-year Bachelor of Information student at the University of Toronto.
Before starting at the Faculty of Information, I was specializing in Digital Enterprise Management, where I learned how to use digital technologies to solve business management and organizational problems in creative and innovative ways. Now, I am exploring technology through a design and user-centric lens and learning how to translate ideas into impactful digital products.
